creditline: Gift of Richard L. Simmons in honor of Lotus Stack
description: three distinct sections; top section of tan fabric with designs woven in red, pink, orange, purple, lime green and dark green; motifs include stripes and geometric shapes; second section of tan fabric with long cords attached at top section; bottom section has red fabric with woven, raised zigzag pattern and multicolored horizontal stripes
title: Child's dress
